Settings.Name: NPC
Settings.Tooltip: Choose which NPC to display.

Settings.Name: Page
Settings.Tooltip: Choose which options page to display.

Settings.Name: Page
Settings.Tooltip: Choose which options page to display.

Settings.Name: Enabled
Settings.Tooltip: Enable or disable Boss General.

Settings.Name: LevelBonus
Settings.Tooltip: Level the Boss to the Party Level + X.

Settings.Name: Downscaling
Settings.Tooltip: Downlevel the Boss to the Party Level.

Settings.Name: Spells
Settings.Tooltip:
Give Boss casters a random number of spells up to X * Level.

The given spells match the Boss archetype from a custom dynamic class-based system.
Works with any modded spells.

Settings.Name: SpellBlacklist
Settings.Tooltip:
The names of spells to not give through Boss Spells sepearated by ';'

Such as:
Lighting Arrow;True Strike

Settings.Name: Enabled
Settings.Tooltip: Enable or disable Boss Bonus.

Settings.Name: HP
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Boss HP by X.

Settings.Name: PercentHP
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase Boss HP by X%.
0.05 means each Boss recieves a 5% max health bonus.

Settings.Name: AC
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Boss AC by X.

Settings.Name: Attack
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Boss Attack Rolls by X.

Settings.Name: DamageBonus
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Boss Damage by X.

Settings.Name: Initiative
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Boss Initiative by X.

Settings.Name: Physical
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase Boss Physical Ability Score by X, based on its highest physical stat.
( Strength or Dexterity )

Settings.Name: Casting
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase Boss Casting Ability Score by X, based on its spellcasting stat.
( Intelligence, Charisma, or Wisdom )

Settings.Tooltip: Increase Boss Strength Ability Score by X.

Settings.Tooltip: Increase Boss Wisdom Ability Score by X.

Settings.Name: Charisma
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Boss Charisma Ability Score by X.

Settings.Tooltip: Enable or disable Boss Leveling.

Settings.Name: Movement
Settings.Tooltip:
Movement speed determines how far you can move per turn.
The levels at which this resource will be given to the Boss, separated by ','

Settings.Name: ActionPoint
Settings.Tooltip:
Your primary resource in combat.
The levels at which this resource will be given to the Boss, separated by ','

Settings.Name: BonusActionPoint
Settings.Tooltip:
Your secondary resource in combat.
The levels at which this resource will be given to the Boss, separated by ','

Settings.Name: ReactionActionPoint
Settings.Tooltip:
Reactions, such as Opportunity Attacks, are responses you can have to events. Reactions can trigger both during and outside of your turn.
The levels at which this resource will be given to the Boss, separated by ','

Settings.Name: Rage
Settings.Tooltip:
The number of times you can enter a Rage.
The levels at which this resource will be given to the Boss, separated by ','

Settings.Name: KiPoint
Settings.Tooltip:
Ki is the magic that flows through all living beings. You can use Ki Points to fuel your advanced monk techniques.
The levels at which this resource will be given to the Boss, separated by ','

Settings.Name: WildShape
Settings.Tooltip:
The number of times you can assume the form of a Wild Shape, or cast Spells as a Dryad.
The levels at which this resource will be given to the Boss, separated by ','

Settings.Name: ChannelOath
Settings.Tooltip:
The number of times you can draw upon the strength of your Oath to power your actions.
The levels at which this resource will be given to the Boss, separated by ','

Settings.Name: SorceryPoint
Settings.Tooltip:
Sorcery Points are an important facet of a Sorcerer's power. They can be spent to augment Spells in unique and powerful ways, or converted to be used as fuel for Spell Slots. You may have up to 24 Sorcery Points at any given time.
The levels at which this resource will be given to the Boss, separated by ','

Settings.Name: SuperiorityDie
Settings.Tooltip:
Superiority dice are spent to empower manoeuvres, improving efficiency in combat.
The levels at which this resource will be given to the Boss, separated by ','

Settings.Name: ChannelDivinity
Settings.Tooltip:
The number of times you can channel your divine powers.
The levels at which this resource will be given to the Boss, separated by ','

Settings.Name: BardicInspiration
Settings.Tooltip:
Through stirring words and music, bards can inspire allies or augment their own attacks.
The levels at which this resource will be given to the Boss, separated by ','

Reactions, such as Opportunity Attacks, are responses you can have to events. Reactions can trigger both during and outside of your turn.

Settings.Name: Rage
Settings.Tooltip:
The number of times you can enter a Rage.
The levels at which this resource will be given to the Ally, separated by ','

Settings.Name: KiPoint
Settings.Tooltip:
Ki is the magic that flows through all living beings. You can use Ki Points to fuel your advanced monk techniques.
The levels at which this resource will be given to the Ally, separated by ','

Settings.Name: WildShape
Settings.Tooltip:
The number of times you can assume the form of a Wild Shape, or cast Spells as a Dryad.
The levels at which this resource will be given to the Ally, separated by ','

Settings.Name: ChannelOath
Settings.Tooltip:
The number of times you can draw upon the strength of your Oath to power your actions.
The levels at which this resource will be given to the Ally, separated by ','

Settings.Name: SorceryPoint
Settings.Tooltip:
Sorcery Points are an important facet of a Sorcerer's power. They can be spent to augment Spells in unique and powerful ways, or converted to be used as fuel for Spell Slots. You may have up to 24 Sorcery Points at any given time.
The levels at which this resource will be given to the Ally, separated by ','

Settings.Name: SuperiorityDie
Settings.Tooltip:
Superiority dice are spent to empower manoeuvres, improving efficiency in combat.
The levels at which this resource will be given to the Ally, separated by ','

Settings.Name: ChannelDivinity
Settings.Tooltip:
The number of times you can channel your divine powers.
The levels at which this resource will be given to the Ally, separated by ','

Settings.Name: BardicInspiration
Settings.Tooltip:
Through stirring words and music, bards can inspire allies or augment their own attacks.
The levels at which this resource will be given to the Ally, separated by ','

Settings.Name: Enabled
Settings.Tooltip: Enable or disable Enemy General.

Settings.Name: LevelBonus
Settings.Tooltip: Level the Enemy to the Party Level + X.

Settings.Name: Downscaling
Settings.Tooltip: Downlevel the Enemy to the Party Level.

Settings.Name: Spells
Settings.Tooltip:
Give Enemy casters a random number of spells up to X * Level.

The given spells match the Enemy archetype from a custom dynamic class-based system.
Works with any modded spells.

Settings.Name: SpellBlacklist
Settings.Tooltip:
The names of spells to not give through Enemy Spells sepearated by ';'

Such as:
Lighting Arrow;True Strike
